name: Disjointed Realm
description:
An endless dash 'em up about killing beasts and their joint spirits.

Arrows/wasd to move, spacebar to dash.
Kill beasts to get their ghosts, which slow you down, or kill ghosts to kill the beast attached.

I was hoping to do something with the trails you leave behind, like the beasts could hit them to hurt you, or you could use them as a distraction to get behind the beasts, but eh. Was also hoping to have a bunch more animations that would play during the game, but also eh. Really didn't prioritize well, lol.

Made for the GMTK game jam 2021
